data.title: Depatie Facing Quebecor Profit Slowed by Print: Corporate Canada
data.meta_description: Robert Depatie quadrupled profit while running Quebecor Inc.’s Videotron cable unit. When he becomes chief executive officer in May, he takes over media businesses with more dismal growth prospects.
data.text:
Robert Depatie quadrupled profit while running Quebecor Inc.’s Videotron cable unit. When he becomes chief executive officer in May, he takes over media businesses with more dismal growth prospects.

His responsibilities as CEO will include the Sun Media chain of English-language tabloids and Le Journal de Montreal, Quebec’s most-read daily. Sales at the group, which accounts for about a quarter of Quebecor’s total revenue, have dropped every year since 2008 as advertising waned.
